Identifying Characteristics: Stems: long slender, single leaf per stem
Leaves: small (1.5-5cm wide), heart-shaped, entire, slightly scalloped margin
Flowers: June to September, delicate, white (1cm diameter) with 5 petals
Other: clumps of elongate tuberous roots (resemble bunch of bananas) along stem near surface
Habitat: Quiet waters of lakes and streams
Range: Native Range: Maine, New England, eastern seaboard and gulf coast of United States
